content:
For i18n I set up TravisCI, by chance I just saw following message:

Please be aware travis-ci.org will be shutting down in several weeks, with all accounts migrating to travis-ci.com. Please stay tuned here for more information.

What does that mean for contrib modules using TravisCI? Can we continue using it or is there any action needed?
Thanks for the heads-up @indigoxela :pray:

From the .com hone page:
"Testing your open source projects is always 100% free!
Seriously. Always. We like to think of it as our way of giving back to a community that gives us so much as well."
The shut down message is also displayed on the .org site.
